Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Riverdell Way, taking in the scenery of forests and buildings.
Room.LongDescription: it's odd to be walking along the street and seeing on the east side of the road, a number of buildings housing shops and services, and on the west side, a dense forest. The forest to the west is very thick, covered with shrubs and thorn bushes, making it virtually impossible to enter.
